mapper.insert: insert into yl_guarantee (id, person_id, pay_cost, data_zip, card, application_time, remark, status) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{personId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payCost,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{dataZip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{card,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applicationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.update: update yl_guarantee set person_id = #{personId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_cost = #{payCost,jdbcType=TINYINT}, data_zip = #{dataZip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, card = #{card,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, application_time = #{applicationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, person_id, pay_cost, data_zip, card, application_time, remark, status from yl_guarantee
